text: Vigia is a low mountain in the northwestern part of the island of Boa Vista, Cape Verde. Its elevation is 146 m. It is situated 4 km north of the island capital Sal Rei, and 2 km south of the headland Ponta do Sol. It is part of the Ponta do Sol Nature Reserve covering 467 hectares of land and sea.Protected areas in the island of Boa Vista - Municipality of Boa Vista, March 2013 ==See also== * List of mountains in Cape Verde ==References== Category:Mountains of Cape Verde Category:Geography of Boa Vista, Cape Verde Category:Stratovolcanoes
title: Vigia (mountain)
